meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of fungi of the class Basidiomycetes.
meanings.sent1: The basidiomycetous mushrooms have unique spore-producing structures.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study basidiomycetous fungi to understand their ecological roles.
meanings.sent3: The basidiomycetous forest floor seemed like a magical kingdom of tiny organisms.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was as diverse and intricate as the basidiomycetous world.
meanings.sent5: The basidiomycetous nature of the forest was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: A fungus of the class Basidiomycetes.
meanings.sent1: The basidiomycetous was identified by its unique spore-producing structures.
meanings.sent2: In the forest, you can find various basidiomycetous mushrooms.
meanings.sent3: The basidiomycetous in the garden seemed to be having a party.
meanings.sent4: The basidiomycetous spread across the forest like a colorful carpet.
meanings.sent5: The basidiomycetous stood tall among the other fungi.
